overview: Lu left South Africa and her Zulu-Sotho heritage behind to become a dancer in America,  and when she falls in love with Tex, she knows he’s the man to marry. But when she brings  Tex home to meet her family, she discovers she’s been promised since birth to a Zulu king.  Caught between two men, two families, and two countries, Lou has to come to terms with  who she is so she can fight for what she wants.
title: Zulu Wedding
